text: Eddie Lee Jackson (July 7, 1949 â€“ December 18, 2020) was an American politician. He was a Democratic member of the Illinois House of Representatives from January 9, 2009 through January 11, 2017. He was born in Canalou, Missouri. Jackson died of COVID-19 on December 18, 2020, in East St. Louis, Illinois. He was 71. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Members of the Illinois General Assembly Category:Politicians from Missouri Category:Politicians from Illinois Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Illinois Category:Educators from Illinois Category:Educators from Missouri
title: Eddie Lee Jackson
